com.communote.server.core.database.liquibase

Class AbstractLiquibaseDatabaseUpdater

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.core.common.database.DatabaseUpdater
      • com.communote.server.core.database.liquibase.AbstractLiquibaseDatabaseUpdater
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.context.ResourceLoaderAware
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    StandaloneLiquibaseDatabaseUpdater

    public abstract class AbstractLiquibaseDatabaseUpdater
extends DatabaseUpdater
implements org.springframework.context.ResourceLoaderAware
    Database updater using the liquibase framework and a configured Hibernate session factory implementor to get the database connection.
    Implementation is inspired by liquibase.spring.SpringLiquibase
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected static String CHANGESET_CONTEXT_CLIENT
      Context to be used in change-sets which should be run on all databases.
      protected static String CHANGESET_CONTEXT_GLOBAL
      Context to be used in change-sets which should only be run on the master (aka global) database.
      protected static String CHANGESET_CONTEXT_STANDALONE
      Context to be used in change-sets which should be run if the installation is a standalone installation.

    • Field Detail

      • CHANGESET_CONTEXT_CLIENT

        protected static final String CHANGESET_CONTEXT_CLIENT
        Context to be used in change-sets which should be run on all databases. For a standalone installation this is the one and only database. For an installation supporting multi-tenancy this refers to the databases of all tenants. Using this context has the same effect as providing no context at a change-set.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CHANGESET_CONTEXT_GLOBAL

        protected static final String CHANGESET_CONTEXT_GLOBAL
        Context to be used in change-sets which should only be run on the master (aka global) database. For a standalone installation this is the one and only database. For an installation supporting multi-tenancy this refers to the database of the master tenant, which is the one that was created first and allows creating other tenants.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CHANGESET_CONTEXT_STANDALONE

        protected static final String CHANGESET_CONTEXT_STANDALONE
        Context to be used in change-sets which should be run if the installation is a standalone installation. For an installation supporting multi-tenancy change-sets with this context should be ignored.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • AbstractLiquibaseDatabaseUpdater

        public AbstractLiquibaseDatabaseUpdater()

    • Method Detail

      • beforeDatabaseUpdate

        protected void beforeDatabaseUpdate(DatabaseUpdateType updateType)
                             throws DatabaseUpdateException
        Is called before a database update is started. Default implementation does nothing
        Parameters:
        updateType - the type of the update which should be run
        Throws:
        DatabaseUpdateException - in case of an error, like some missing preconditions

      • doExecute

        protected void doExecute(DatabaseUpdateType updateType)
                  throws DatabaseUpdateException
        Description copied from class: DatabaseUpdater
        Will be invoked by DatabaseUpdater.execute(DatabaseUpdateType) to do the actual update.
        Specified by:
        doExecute in class DatabaseUpdater
        Parameters:
        updateType - the type of update that should be executed
        Throws:
        DatabaseUpdateException - in case of an error database update error

      • getConnection

        protected Connection getConnection()
                            throws SQLException
        Returns:
        the connection that can be used to update the database
        Throws:
        SQLException - in case of an sql exception

      • getContexts

        protected abstract String[] getContexts()
        The contexts of the update. Any liquibase change-set which has a context which is not the returned array will be ignored. A change-set without context, however, will be executed.
        Returns:
        the contexts

      • getDatabaseInformation

        protected abstract String getDatabaseInformation(Connection connection)
        Get some information about the database. This method is only called if the update resulted in an error to create a useful log message.
        Parameters:
        connection - the database connection that was used in the update or null if the update failed because no connection could be retrieved
        Returns:
        the database information to add to the error log message

      • getResourceLoader

        public org.springframework.core.io.ResourceLoader getResourceLoader()
        Returns:
        the resourceLoader

      • getSessionFactoryImplementor

        protected org.hibernate.engine.SessionFactoryImplementor getSessionFactoryImplementor()
        Returns:
        the configured sessionFactoryImplementor

      • getUpdateDataProvider

        protected LiquibaseUpdateDataProvider getUpdateDataProvider()
        Returns:
        the set liquibase data provider or an instance of LiquibaseUpdateDataProvider if no custom provider was set with setUpdateDataProvider(LiquibaseUpdateDataProvider)

      • prepareLiquibase

        protected void prepareLiquibase(liquibase.Liquibase liquibase,
                                Map<String,Object> changeLogParameters)
                         throws DatabaseUpdateException
        Prepare the liquibase instance before doing the actual update. This implementation sets the change-log parameters.
        Parameters:
        liquibase - the liquibase instance to prepare for the update
        changeLogParameters - the parameters to replace placeholders in the change-log file. Can be null.
        Throws:
        DatabaseUpdateException - in case the preparation lead to an error

      • setResourceLoader

        public void setResourceLoader(org.springframework.core.io.ResourceLoader resourceLoader)
        Specified by:
        setResourceLoader in interface org.springframework.context.ResourceLoaderAware

      • setSessionFactoryImplementor

        public void setSessionFactoryImplementor(org.hibernate.engine.SessionFactoryImplementor sessionFactoryImplementor)
        Set the hibernate session factory implementor to use for retrieving a connection for updating the database.
        Parameters:
        sessionFactoryImplementor - the sessionFactoryImplementor to set

      • setUpdateDataProvider

        public void setUpdateDataProvider(LiquibaseUpdateDataProvider updateDataProvider)
        Set the data provider to use for the update
        Parameters:
        updateDataProvider - the data provider

      • updateDatabase

        protected void updateDatabase(String changeLog,
                              Map<String,Object> changeLogParameters)
                       throws DatabaseUpdateException
        Update the database that is returned by getConnection() with the given change-log file and change-log parameters.
        Parameters:
        changeLog - the location of the change-log file on the classpath
        changeLogParameters - mapping from key to value where the key represents a palceholder in a change-set of the change-log file which should be replaced by the value. Can be null.
        Throws:
        DatabaseUpdateException - in case the update failed

      • updaterRunBefore

        public boolean updaterRunBefore()
        Description copied from class: DatabaseUpdater
        Returns whether the updater run at least once against the database. It does not matter which DatabaseUpdateType was executed.
        Specified by:
        updaterRunBefore in class DatabaseUpdater
        Returns:
        true if the updater was run before
